description: Set the navigation audio mixing mode. This feature supports configuring the navigation audio mixing mode as direct mixing or automatic mixing. The navigation audio mixing function refers to the vehicle's audio system being able to simultaneously play navigation voice prompts and media music audio, with specific settings to adjust the volume balance between the two. This ensures drivers can clearly hear navigation instructions while enjoying music.

value.description: Navigation audio mixing mode options: [direct mixing, automatic mixing].

name: InCar Volume Query
description: Query the volume values of vehicle systems, including multimedia volume, navigation volume, voice volume, call volume, and ringtone volume. For example, use this function when asking 'What is the current navigation volume level?'

module.description: Query options including multimedia volume, navigation volume, voice volume, call volume (phone), ringtone volume (incoming call).

name: Door Opening Media Volume Reduction Control Switch
description: Enable or disable the automatic multimedia volume reduction feature when vehicle doors open. This feature allows users to set automatic volume reduction during door opening to avoid disturbing the surrounding environment or passengers. Users can enable/disable this function according to personal preferences.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Adaptive Front Light Switch Control
description: Turn on or off the adaptive front light. The system will automatically enhance or reduce headlight brightness based on environmental conditions when activated.
usage: Open the adaptive front light to automatically adjust illumination intensity through brightness enhancement or reduction according to surrounding environment.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: 3D Surround Volume Adjustment
description: Adjust the intensity value of 3D surround sound effects. Supports adjusting the 3D surround volume to specified levels (020), increasing/decreasing 3D surround volume, or setting preset levels [low, mid, high].

value.description: Adjustment value for 3D surround volume, with three representation formats:  Increase/decrease volume using [+/], where '+ ' indicates volume increase and '' indicates decrease.  Set specific volume level using integers between [0, 20].  Set preset levels using [low, mid, high], where 'low' indicates low, 'mid' medium, and 'high' high level.

name: Headrest Audio Mode Switching
description: Cycle through headrest audio playback modes (Shared, Driver's Zone, Private, Full Vehicle Private), switching from current audio playback mode to another. For example, use this function when users mention switching headrest audio channels.

name: Switch Casting App Control
description: Open or close the Switch Casting app.

name: Bluetooth Connection and Settings Page
description: Open or close the Bluetooth connection page or settings page of the vehicle system. When users need to connect new Bluetooth devices or adjust Bluetooth settings, opening this page helps them quickly access relevant interfaces and simplifies operation processes.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

page.description: Output 'page' when needing to access the connection interface; output 'settings' when needing to access configuration interface

name: Time Format Settings
description: Set the time format for the vehicle system time, including 12hour format and 24hour format.

value.description: Time format options

name: Refrigerator Door Control
description: Open or close the builtin vehicle refrigerator door.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Phone Volume Settings Page
description: Open or close the phone volume settings page. Opening the phone volume settings page allows users to view and manually modify the related functionalities of phone volume.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: External LowSpeed Alert Sound Volume Adjustment
description: Adjust the volume of the external lowspeed alert sound. The lowspeed alert sound simulates engine noise when the vehicle is moving at low speeds. This feature supports: 1. Increasing or decreasing the external lowspeed alert sound volume. 2. Adjusting the external lowspeed alert sound volume to specified levels. 3. Setting the external lowspeed alert sound to maximum or minimum volume levels.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: External Speaker Volume Adjustment
description: Adjust the volume value of external speakers, supporting setting to specific percentage/level values, increasing/decreasing volume, or setting to maximum/minimum levels.

value.description: External speaker volume adjustment value with three formats:  Absolute values: percentage (1%99%) or level numbers [1, n].  Relative adjustments: [+/percentage] or [+/integer], where '+' increases and '' decreases volume.  Extreme values: [max, min] for maximum/minimum settings.

name: Safety Alert Tone Level Adjustment
description: Adjust the volume level of invehicle safety alert tones, including low, mid, and high levels.

value.description: Safety alert tone level including low, mid, high. Low represents low level, mid represents medium level, high represents high level.

name: Headrest Audio Mode Intelligent Switching Control
description: Control whether the headrest audio playback mode enables intelligent switching. When intelligent switching is enabled, the system will automatically switch to appropriate modes based on scenarios. The headrest audio intelligent switching feature will automatically select suitable playback modes for users according to different scenarios.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Bluetooth Earphone Volume Settings Page
description: Open or close the Bluetooth earphone settings page. Opening the volume settings page allows users to view and manually modify Bluetooth audio volume related functions.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Voice Settings Page
description: Open or close the voice settings page. Used to quickly open or close the voice settings page when adjustments are needed.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

page.description: Mandatory parameter specifying the page type.

name: Full Vehicle Alert Volume Adjustment
description: Adjust the volume level for full vehicle alerts, supporting increasing/decreasing the alert volume or setting predefined levels [low, mid, high].

value.description: Volume adjustment value with two formats:  Volume increase/decrease expressed as [+/ percentage] or [+/ integer], integer range [1, n], percentage range [1%, 99%], '+' indicates volume up, '' indicates volume down.  Predefined volume levels: [low, mid, high], where 'low'=low, 'mid'=medium, 'high'=high.

name: Refrigerator Temperature Query
description: Check the current temperature of the refrigerator.

name: OneClick Power Off Control
description: Execute vehicle poweroff operation. Oneclick poweroff, also known as 'oneclick power cutoff' or 'emergency power cutoff'. When users do not require vehicle electrical power, this function can rapidly disconnect the vehicle's highvoltage system power supply.

name: Immersive Sound Mode Switch Control
description: Enable or disable the Immersive Sound mode. Activating Immersive Sound mode provides an immersive auditory experience, defaulting to wind sound.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Voice Volume Adjustment
description: Adjust invehicle voice playback and voice call volume levels, supporting volume adjustment to specific levels/percentage values, increasing/decreasing volume, or setting to maximum/minimum values.

value.description: Voice volume adjustment value with three formats:  Absolute values: Use percentage (%) or integer level [1, n]. Valid ranges: level [1, n], percentage [1%99%].  Relative adjustments: Use [+/percentage] or [+/integer] formats. Integer range [1, n], percentage range [1%99%]. '+' indicates volume up, '' indicates volume down.  Limit values: Options [max, min], where 'max' sets to maximum and 'min' sets to minimum.

name: System Settings Page
description: Open or close the vehicle system settings page (outermost layer). System settings = vehicle settings = general settings. Opening the system settings page allows users to enter settings pages of other functional modules for more detailed adjustments. Opening the settings indicates using this function to access the system settings page.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Refrigerator Switch Control
description: Open or close the invehicle refrigerator.
extra_rag_text: The cooling box refers to the refrigerator

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Touchscreen Sound Settings
description: Set the sound emitted when operating the touchscreen. The touchscreen sound switching functionality typically supports multiple sound mode selections, currently including three modes: Classic, Zen, and Lush.

sound.description: Type of touch feedback sound including Classic, Zen, and Lush. Select [Zen] when users want relatively calm touch sounds.

name: Space Sound Effect Settings Page
description: Open or close the invehicle space sound effect/sound field mode settings page. Opening the space sound effect/sound field mode page allows users to manually adjust the invehicle acoustic experience or sound field modes.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Car Wash Mode Control
description: Open or close the car wash mode.

name: Exterior Speaker Playback Mode Settings
description: This feature allows users to switch audio playback modes between exterior playback and interior trial listening to provide a richer audio experience.

page_function.description: Specifies audio playback as exterior playback or interior trial listening.

position.description: Specifies the position of the speaker.

name: Headrest Height Adjustment
description: Adjust the height of the headrest, supporting setting to specified height, increasing/decreasing headrest height, or setting to maximum/minimum position.

value.description: Headrest height adjustment value with three formats:  Absolute percentage (1%99%) when setting specific height.  [+/−percentage] format (1%99%) for incremental adjustment: '+' indicates height increase, '−' indicates decrease.  [max, min] for setting maximum/minimum height.

position.description: Target seat position(s) in vehicle. Must output as list. Output default ["CUR"] when position cannot be determined.

name: Refrigerator Settings Page
description: Open or close the refrigerator's settings page or adjustment page.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

page.description: Match based on contextual usage. Optional values are [settings, page]

name: Refrigerator Delayed PowerOff Duration Setting
description: Set the duration for refrigerator delayed poweroff.

value.description: Set the duration for refrigerator delayed poweroff in 'HH:MM:SS' format. Example: 02:00:00.

name: Notification Center Page
description: Open or close the Notification Center page. This feature allows users to view and manage notifications from various applications, enabling quick access and processing of notifications from different apps. Typically used when users want to check unread notifications or adjust notification settings.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when the action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Phone Volume Adjustment
description: Adjust the phone call volume level (sound value) inside the vehicle. 1. Supports setting phone call volume to specified gear positions or percentage values. 2. Increase or decrease phone call volume. 3. Set phone call volume to maximum/minimum values.

value.description: Phone volume adjustment value with three representation formats:  When setting to specific volume, use absolute percentage or gear numerical values. Gear numerical range [1, n], percentage range [1%, 99%].  Increase/decrease volume represented by [+/], [+/percentage] or [+/integer], integer range [1, n], percentage range [1%, 99%]. '+' indicates volume increase, '' indicates decrease. Expressions like 'slightly increase phone volume' should output '+', 'slightly decrease phone volume' should output ''.  For extreme volume settings, optional values [max, min] where 'max' indicates maximum value, 'min' indicates minimum value.

name: Volume Speed Compensation Level Adjustment
description: Adjust the compensation levels for volume changes relative to vehicle speed, including low, medium, and high levels.

value.description: Volume speed compensation level including low, mid, high. low indicates low level, mid indicates medium level, high indicates high level.

name: Lighting Settings Page
description: Open or close the vehicle lighting settings/page. This function allows users to open or close the vehicle lighting settings page when they need to access it for adjustment or viewing. Note: This feature is only triggered when the user does not specify a specific light type.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Touchscreen Sound Control
description: Enable or disable touch feedback sound for the screen.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: My Vehicle Settings Page
description: Open or close the 'My Vehicle' settings/page. This feature allows users to open or close the vehicle settings main page, enabling quick access to My Vehiclerelated configurations when needed.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Speed Volume Compensation Switch Control
description: Enable or disable the speed volume compensation feature. When activated, the system automatically adjusts volume based on current vehicle speed, ensuring drivers hear clear incar audio at different speeds.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: FullVehicle Immersive Surround Sound Switch Control
description: Turn on or off the fullvehicle immersive surround sound effect.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Safety Alarm Prompt Tone Switch Control
description: Open or close the invehicle safety alarm prompt tone. Enable the safety alarm prompt tone when needing to enhance driving safety awareness, such as requiring seat belt reminder.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: System Volume Adjustment
description: Adjust the vehicle system volume value, supporting adjustment to specified volume levels or percentage values, increasing/decreasing volume, or setting system volume to maximum/minimum values. System volume controls all device volumes in the vehicle, applicable to any scenario requiring incar volume adjustment such as music playback, phone calls.

value.description: System volume adjustment value with three representation formats: 1. When setting specific volume, use absolute percentage (1%99%) or gear level values ([1, n]). 2. When increasing/decreasing volume, use [+/percentage] or [+/integer] format (integer range [1, n], percentage range [1%, 99%]), where '+' indicates volume up and '' indicates volume down. 3. When setting extreme values, options are [max, min] where 'max' means set to maximum and 'min' means set to minimum.

name: LowSpeed Exterior Warning Sound Switch Control
description: Enable or disable the lowspeed exterior warning sound feature. The lowspeed warning sound simulates engine noise when the vehicle is moving at low speeds. When enabled, the vehicle will emit exterior warning sounds during lowspeed driving to alert pedestrians.
usage: When users want to disable the vehicle's driving sound volume, indicating to turn off the lowspeed exterior warning sound.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Automatic Parking Switch Control
description: Enable or disable the automatic parking function.

name: 2D Surround Sound Volume Adjustment
description: Adjust the intensity level (volume value) of 2D surround sound. Supports increasing/decreasing 2D surround sound volume or setting preset surround sound volume levels [low, mid, high]. Default surround sound mode is 2D surround sound.

value.description: Adjustment value for 2D surround sound volume, with two representation formats:  Increase/decrease volume using [+/] symbols, where '+ ' indicates volume increase and '' indicates volume decrease.  Preset volume levels using [low, mid, high], where 'low' represents low level, 'mid' represents medium level, and 'high' represents high level.

name: Vehicle Control Settings Page
description: Open or close vehicle control settings/page. This function can be invoked when users need to access vehicle control interface for configuration or viewing. For example, after starting the vehicle, users may want to check or modify vehicle settings such as ECO mode or driving assistance.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Daytime Running Taillight Control
description: Turn on or off the daytime running taillight.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Display Settings Page
description: Open or close the screen display settings page.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Multimodal Interaction Switch Control
description: Enable or disable AI multimodal interaction functionality.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Bluetooth Earphone Volume Adjustment
description: Adjust the Bluetooth playback volume value in the vehicle, supporting adjustment to specified volume levels or percentage values, increasing/decreasing Bluetooth volume, and setting Bluetooth volume to maximum/minimum values.

value.description: Bluetooth volume adjustment value with three representation formats:  When setting to specified volume, use absolute percentage or gear level values (gear range [1, n], percentage range [1%, 99%]).  For volume increase/decrease, use [+/ percentage] or [+/ integer] (integer range [1, n], percentage range [1%, 99%]). '+' indicates volume up, '' indicates volume down. Default output '+' when unspecified for raise, '' for lower. Example: lowering volume is represented as ''.  For extreme values, options [max, min]: 'max' sets to maximum, 'min' to minimum.

name: Immersive Sound Volume Adjustment
description: Adjust the volume of the Immersive Sound effect. Immersive Sound ≠ surround sound. Supports increasing/decreasing Immersive Sound effect volume, or setting it to preset volume levels (low, mid, high).

value.description: Adjustment value for Immersive Sound effect volume, formatted in two ways:  Increase/decrease volume using [+/], where '+' indicates volume up and '' indicates volume down.  Set preset volume level with [low, mid, high], where 'low'=low, 'mid'=medium, 'high'=high.

name: PM2.5 Value Query
description: Query current invehicle PM2.5 value.
usage: This function is used to query invehicle air quality.

name: Starlight Shimmer App Control
description: Open or close the 'Starlight Shimmer' app.

name: WiFi Password Query
description: Query the password of the currently connected WiFi.

name: Transparent Vehicle Model Switch Control
description: Open or close the transparent vehicle model (360 vehicle view image) functionality. The transparent vehicle model helps users quickly view the vehicle's overall condition, such as whether doors are properly closed.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Headrest Speaker Volume Adjustment
description: Adjust the headrest speaker volume at specified positions. Users can utilize this function to modify headrest speaker volume in different seating positions, obtaining optimal experience when listening to music or viewing entertainment content.

value.description: Volume adjustment values with three representation formats:  When setting specific volume, use absolute percentage or numeric values (1based index). Numeric range [1, n], percentage range [1%, 99%].  For volume increase/decrease, use [+/ percentage] or [+/ integer]. Accept integer values in the range [1, n] or percentage values [1%, 99%]. '+' indicates volume up, '' indicates volume down.  For extreme values, optional [max, min]. 'max' sets to maximum volume, 'min' sets to minimum volume.

position.description: Indicates the position of headrest speakers.

name: Wumai KSong Mixing Volume Adjustment
description: Increase or decrease the mixing volume during Wumai KSong.

value.description: '+' indicates volume increase, '' indicates volume decrease.

name: Exterior Lowspeed Prompt Sound Switching
description: Switch the sound effects for exterior lowspeed prompts. The exterior lowspeed prompt sounds (simulated sounds) include three types: Initial Appearance, Streaming Light, and Starlight. Supports unspecified sound effect names.

sound.description: Prompt sound effect. Output 'NULL' when user doesn't specify sound effect name. Example: 'Change the exterior lowspeed prompt sound' should output 'NULL'.

name: FlashLight Application Control
description: Open or close the 'FlashLight' application (APP).

name: 2D Surround Sound Switch Control
description: Turn on or off the 2D Surround Sound mode effect. Users can enable 2D Surround Sound mode when wanting to enhance or reduce audio spatial perception. The default surround sound mode is 2D Surround Sound.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Refrigerator Temperature Adjustment
description: Adjust the temperature inside the vehicle refrigerator. The refrigerator temperature affects food texture, such as cold drinks, snacks, milk, etc. Supports raising/lowering refrigerator temperature, setting to specific temperatures or preset levels [low, medium, high], and setting to maximum/minimum temperature. Related scenarios:  'Drinks not cold enough, need lower temperature' indicates lowering refrigerator temperature  'Milk not warm enough, need higher temperature' indicates raising refrigerator temperature.

value.description: Temperature adjustment value. Four representation formats:  When setting specific temperature: use [temperature value].  When adjusting temperature: use [+/ integer], where '+' indicates increase and '' indicates decrease (increase=raise, decrease=lower).  When setting extreme temperatures: options [max, min].  When using preset levels: options [low, mid, high].

name: Equalizer Sound Effect Adjustment
description: Adjust the vehicle audio system's equalizer sound effects to adapt to different music styles. Use this function when users want to customize incar audio effects based on music genre or personal preferences. For example, adjust the equalizer to enhance rhythmic feel when playing pop music.

name: Refrigerator Mode Control
description: Control the status of refrigerator modes. Refrigerator modes include cooling mode, heating mode, rapid cooling mode (quick freeze), cosmetic storage mode, beverage chilling mode, fruit/vegetable preservation mode, and milk warming mode. For example, the cooling mode can chill beverages and ice water. The milk warming mode can heat milk.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]

mode.description: Working mode of the refrigerator, available values: cooling, heating, rapid cooling, cosmetics storage, beverage chilling, fruit/vegetable preservation, milk warming.

name: Incar Temperature Query
description: Query current temperature inside the vehicle.

name: Parking Air Conditioning Switch Control
description: Turn on or off the parking air conditioning (when vehicle is stationary).
usage: This function is specifically used for adjusting incar air conditioning temperature during parking scenarios, such as cooling the vehicle interior rapidly during summer parking breaks, or providing heating/warm air during winter parking breaks.  When user says 'The car has gotten cold after parking this long. Let's turn off that air'，it indicates closing the parking air conditioning.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Custom Tuning Settings Page
description: Open or close the custom tuning settings page. This page allows users to customize incar audio effects and finetune sound parameters when they want personalized listening experiences.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Multimedia External Playback Control
description: Control multimedia audio playback either externally or synchronized inside/outside the vehicle. This function should be used when users need to adjust the playback range of invehicle multimedia audio, such as enabling outdoor music playback during external activities.

function.description: Specifies playback location mode, including external playback and synchronized inout vehicle playback.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: supply_request
description: Information supplementation tool. This tool is used to request users to supplement information.
usage:
Use this tool when there are multiple applicable tools but cannot determine which tool the user refers to, when parameters are ambiguous, or when parameters do not match specifications.
 Use this tool when user instructions lack control objects and cannot be clearly defined as operating specific objects.
 Use this tool when user instructions lack adjustment parameters and the required functional adjustments are unclear.

name: AC Airflow Direction Settings Page
description: Open or close the AC airflow direction settings page.
usage: Open this page when users need to view or manually modify airflow directionrelated settings; Exiting AC airflow direction adjustment indicates closing this page.
extra_rag_text: Adjusting AC airflow direction settings indicates opening this page.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Scenario Mode Control
description: Activate or deactivate scenario modes for the Scene Plaza App. Specific scenario modes include Goddess Mode (Romance Mode), Cinema Mode (Movie Mode), etc.
usage: When user requests 'Help me start a romance mode', this indicates activating Goddess Mode. Activating 'Romantic Rendezvous' means enabling Goddess Mode. When users want to watch movies in the vehicle, assist them in activating Cinema Mode.

name: Assisted Driving Settings Page
description: Open or close the vehicle's assisted driving settings page. The assisted driving settings page contains driving modes and ADAS lighting function settings, allowing users to view or manually adjust these configurations.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Residual Heat AC Switch Control
description: Turn on or off the residual heat air conditioning system.
usage: Activating residual heat functionality maintains cabin temperature by utilizing remaining engine heat, applicable for prewarming the vehicle in cold weather conditions.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Wumai Karaoke Switch Control
description: Enable or disable the AI Wumai Karaoke application. This function allows users to start/stop Wumai Karaoke entertainment through the application. The feature is designed for invehicle entertainment scenarios, helping users enjoy singing while driving.
usage: Enable this feature when users want to sing; disable it when users don't want to sing due to throat dryness.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Equalizer Settings Page
description: Open or close the equalizer (sound effect adjuster, mixer) settings page. Users can utilize this function to enter the equalizer settings interface for personalized sound effect adjustments when needing to modify audio quality.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Refrigerator Delayed Poweroff Control
description: Enable or disable the delayed poweroff function for the invehicle refrigerator. When enabled, the refrigerator can continue operating after exiting the vehicle.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Check Air Conditioner Filter Lifespan
description: Used to query the remaining usage time of the air conditioner filter.
usage: Users can utilize this function to understand the remaining lifespan of the air conditioner filter for timely replacement.

name: AI Rhythm Switch Control
description: Turn on or off AI Rhythm.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Sound Effect Generation
description: Generate required sound effects for broadcast (speech) content based on user descriptions, specifically creating voice broadcast sound effects.

name: reject_request
description: If none of the tools can fulfill the user's request, use this tool to reject the user request.
usage: For example, 'I've been sitting all the time and my legs are swollen'  when no relevant functionality exists, use this tool to reject the user request.

name: Equalizer Tone Adjustment
description: Adjust vehicle equalizer tone (audio effect) levels. Supports adjusting tones to specified gears/percentages, increasing/decreasing tones, or setting tones to maximum/minimum values. The vehicle equalizer, also called audio effect adjuster or mixer, controls the level of specific tones (audio effects). Tones refer to sound frequency ranges during playback, including bass, midrange, and treble. Example scenarios:  'Set midrange to maximum'  'The playback sound is too sharp, turn down the bass'  'I don't want bass anymore'  'The audio effect is too harsh, make it softer'

part.description: Specified tone range with options [bass, midrange, treble]

value.description: Equalizer adjustment value with three formats:  When setting absolute values: numerical values in [1, n] range  For incremental adjustments: [+/(positive integers)] format where integers ∈ [1,n], '+' indicates increase, '' indicates decrease. For expressions like 'make it louder' (without specific numbers), output '+'; similar 'make it softer' outputs ''  For limits: options [max, min] where 'max'=maximum, 'min'=minimum

name: AC Vent Switch Control
description: Open or close the AC vent (electric vent).
usage: The AC vent is where air flows out from the AC system. Use this function only when users explicitly mention opening or closing the vent.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

position.description: Affected invehicle positions, output must be a list. When seat position cannot be determined, DO NOT hallucinate, output default value ["CUR"].

name: Vehicle Mileage Reset Switch
description: Turn on or off the vehicle mileage reset function. When specific conditions are met, the vehicle mileage will be reset.

function.description: Specific conditions for vehicle mileage reset, including energy replenishment reset and parking reset

action.description: Status of the vehicle mileage reset switch

name: AC Temperature Sync Control
description: Enable or disable the AC temperature synchronization function. Note: AC 'temperature sync' is not equivalent to auto mode.
usage: Enable AC temperature sync to maintain consistent temperature settings in specified zones, eliminating manual adjustments. Disabling temperature sync allows users to individually adjust temperatures per zone, creating temperature differences (e.g. one side cooler and the other warmer).

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

position.description: Output 'front row' when user explicitly mentions front seats. Output 'NULL' when seat position is unspecified.

name: Energy Consumption Curve Display Mode Switching

usage: Enable this function when vehicle is locked. The air conditioning system will automatically perform drying treatment to prevent interior dampness and odors. This function is only available when vehicle is locked, and should be used in rainy days or high humidity environments.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

usage: E.g., 'Change to a xx wallpaper for me'|'Draw a xx wallpaper for me'.

usage: Open this page to allow users to perform detailed configuration and adjustment of air conditioning settings. Typically used when manual modification of air conditioning operation modes, temperature, fan speed, ionizer settings, or other configurations is required. Exiting air conditioning adjustment indicates closing this page.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Sales Assistant Application Control
description: Open or close the 'Sales Assistant' (Vehicle Display Assistant) application (APP).

name: Second Row Automatic Air Conditioning Occupancy Detection
description: Enable or disable the second row automatic air conditioning occupancy detection function.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Air Vent Direction Adjustment
description: Adjust the direction of vehicle air conditioning vents, including upward, downward, left, and right orientations.

feature.description: Controlled component with options [NULL, air_vent]. Output 'NULL' when user doesn't mention 'air_vent'.

direction_range.description: Output 'max' when vent reaches uppermost/lowermost/leftmost/rightmost position, otherwise default 'NULL'.

position.description: Target seat positions in vehicle, must output as list. Default to ["CUR"] when positions cannot be determined.

name: PM2.5 Air Quality Reminder
description: Enable or disable PM2.5 air quality reminder functionality.
usage: This functionality allows users to enable PM2.5 reminders (window closure suggestions for air comfort) which monitor incabin air quality and alert users to maintain optimal conditions. Note: This feature solely provides monitoring and alert functions without automatic interventions.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Negative Ion Window Close Reminder Settings
description: Open or close the negative ion window close reminder settings.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.
mapping_rules: 'Adjust negative ion window close popup settings'  on

name: Air Purifier Settings Page
description: Open or close the air purifier settings page.
usage: Open this page to allow users to view and modify air purifier settings. Exiting air purification adjustments indicates closing this page.

name: AC Temperature Settings Page
description: Open or close the AC temperature settings (page).
usage: This page contains adjustments for AC temperature and automatic AC synchronization functions. Use this function to open the page when users want to view or manually adjust/set incar AC temperature, or configure temperature synchronization. Exiting AC temperature adjustment or closing the synchronized dualzone temperature settings page indicates closing this page.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.
mapping_rules: Close synchronized dualzone temperature settings page on
Close automatic AC synchronization settings page on

name: Windshield Heating Defog Control
description: Turn on or off the windshield heating function. The windshield heating function helps defogging.
usage: Supports heating for windows (front windows, rear windows) and windshields (front windshield, rear windshield). Heating can achieve defogging effects.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

position.description: Position for heating/defogging control. Options: [front, rear, all, NULL]. Output default 'NULL' when user doesn't specify front/rear/all positions.

name: Air Conditioning Defog/Defrost Control
description: Turn on or off the air conditioning defogging or defrosting functions.
usage: Defogging supports unspecified position defogging, windshield defogging, front windshield defogging, rear windshield defogging, window defogging (glass defogging). Defrosting includes unspecified position defrosting, windshield defrosting, front windshield defrosting, rear windshield defrosting, window defrosting (glass defrosting). Activating this function can quickly remove fog/frost from windshields or car windows.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.
mapping_rules: "Clear the rear window fog for me"  on

position.description: Position controlled for defrosting/defogging, options: [front, rear, all, NULL]. Output default value 'NULL' when user doesn't specify front/rear/all positions.

name: Voice Settings Page
description: Open or close the sound/voice settings page. The sound settings page typically contains all configuration options related to sound and voice, allowing users to find and adjust almost all settings associated with audio output on this page.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: A/C Sync Control
description: Enable or disable the 'A/C Sync' feature.
usage: When enabled, this feature allows users to synchronize climate settings across all zones in the vehicle, ensuring uniform operation of settings like mode and fan speed. Close A/C sync when users indicate they don't want synchronized climate control.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.
mapping_rules: "It's really hot, turn off the A/C sync"  off

position.description: Output 'front' when user explicitly mentions driver/passenger seats. Output 'NULL' when seat position isn't specified.

name: Quick Settings Page
description: Open or close the Quick Settings/Page. This function is used for quick access to quick operation pages or settings in the system.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Filter Cartridge Replacement Button Control
description: Open or close the filter cartridge replacement button. Used when filter cartridge replacement is required.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: CO2 Concentration Monitoring Switch Control
description: Open or close the invehicle CO2 concentration monitoring function.
usage: When enabled, this function monitors carbon dioxide concentration levels, applicable for scenarios requiring air quality attention.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Air Vent Mode Settings
description: Set the air vent airflow direction mode. Vent modes include focus, avoidance, normal, swing, airflow state, manual, auto, updown circulation, leftright circulation modes.
usage: Requests containing 'leftright swing/leftright swaying/leftright air sweep' indicate leftright circulation mode. Requests containing 'updown adjustment/updown swing/updown swaying/updown air sweep' indicate updown circulation mode. Requests like 'focus the airflow' indicate focus mode. Requests like 'let me manually adjust the airflow mode' indicate manual mode.

mode.description: Vent mode type. Output default value 'N/A' when mode cannot be determined.
mapping_rules: AC vent leftright swaying leftright circulation
AC vent updown swaying updown circulation
Let me manually adjust airflow mode manual
AC vent updown adjustment updown circulation

position.description: Target cabin positions. Must output as list. Output default value ["CUR"] when position cannot be determined.

name: Air Purifier Switch Control
description: Turn on or off the air purifier.
usage: The air purifier (air purification mode) can automatically purify air, filter air impurities (like PM2.5 particles), improve air quality, and remove unpleasant odors inside the vehicle to achieve fresh air (improve air quality). Default to turning on the air purifier when needing to improve air quality. When users feel the incar air has improved sufficiently, they can turn off the air purifier.  'Activate the air purification feature' indicates turning on this function.  'Open that function which can automatically remove PM2.5 particles' indicates closing this function.

action.description: Switch status, only [on, off].
mapping_rules: 'This odor is unpleasant, turn on air purification'  on
'I feel the incar air is much better now, please turn that off'  off

position.description: Effective invehicle positions, must output as list. When seat position cannot be determined, must output default value ["CUR"]. Do not fabricate values.

name: Rearview Mirror Heating/Defogging Control
description: Turn on or off heated rearview mirrors (rearview mirror defogging).
usage: Heated rearview mirrors can eliminate fog condensation on the mirrors.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off].

position.description: Controlled position with options [NULL, left, right, all]. Output default value 'NULL' when no specific side is specified.
mapping_rules: left/right rearview mirrors | both side rearview mirrors | dual rearview mirrors all

name: User Manual App Control
description: Open or close the user manual app.

name: AC Temperature Adjustment
description: Adjust AC temperature. 1. Supports increasing or decreasing AC temperature. 2. Supports setting AC temperature to specific values (positive integers) or preset gears (high, mid, low, std). 3. Supports adjusting AC temperature to maximum/minimum gear positions.
usage: Adjust temperature values, default context implies AC temperature adjustment.  'Set AC to xx degrees' means configuring AC temperature to xx°C.  'Lower cabin temperature' indicates decreasing AC temperature.  'Set AC to coldest' configures temperature to minimum.  'Set AC to hottest' configures temperature to maximum.  'Set AC to warm' adjusts temperature to 26°C.  'Set AC to cool' adjusts temperature to 18°C.
extra_rag_text: For driver/passenger/first row/second row/third row cooling requests, interpret as increasing AC temperature.

value.description: AC temperature adjustment value. Three formats supported:  Absolute value: Positive integer n (set to n°C).  Relative adjustment: '+n' (increase n°C)/'n' (decrease n°C).  Preset gears: [max, mid, std, min] representing maximum/medium/standard/minimum gears. Output 'N/A' when adjustment value cannot be determined.

position.description: Target positions in vehicle. Must return array. Use default ["CUR"] when position cannot be determined.
mapping_rules: Turn on cabin AC whole vehicle
Set all temperatures to xx whole vehicle

name: AC Air Volume Settings Page
description: Open or close the AC air volume settings page. The page allows users to view and manually adjust AC airflow settings.
usage: Open this page when users need to check or manually adjust AC air volume, enabling customized airflow adjustments. Exiting the AC airflow adjustment interface indicates closing this page.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: 3D Surround Sound Effect Switch Control
description: Enable or disable the invehicle 3D surround sound effect.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Air Conditioning Air Volume Mode Adjustment
description: Adjust the air conditioning air volume (wind strength) to specified modes, including Gentle, Comfort, and Strong.
usage: When wind strength is light, set to Gentle mode.  When wind strength is moderate, set to Comfort mode.  When wind strength is intense, set to Strong mode.

mode.description: Wind strength mode, options: [Gentle, Comfort, Strong].

position.description: Target invehicle positions. Must output as list. Output default value["CUR"] when seat position cannot be determined.

name: Airflow Mode Adjustment
description: Control the air conditioning's airflow mode. Airflow modes include person (face), face (facial area), foot area, window (glass/windshield) and their combinations.
usage: Upward airflow direction indicates blowing toward face, downward airflow direction indicates blowing toward feet.  When users feel feet are hot, set airflow to blow feet. Close foot airflow when feet are not hot.  When users feel face is hot, set airflow to blow face. Close face airflow when avoiding facial airflow.  When users feel body heat or request body airflow, set airflow to blow person. Disable person airflow when users feel cold or dizzy.  Fulldirection airflow means activating face/window/foot airflow simultaneously.
extra_rag_text: 'Don't blow AC wind at me' indicates setting airflow direction to disable person airflow.

value.description: Airflow directions to enable/disable. Must output as list. Valid options: [face, face*, foot, foot*, window, window*, person, person*]. Option explanations:  face/foot/window/person indicates blowing toward respective area  'face*'/'foot*'/'window*'/'person*' indicates disabling airflow to corresponding area  Mutually exclusive pairs: face/face*, foot/foot*, window/window*, person/person*
mapping_rules: 『AC blows too cold on face; redirect to footwell and window』 ['foot', 'window']
『Activate window and foot airflow, disable face airflow』 ['window', 'foot', 'face*']

position.description: Vehicle seat positions. Must output as list. Use default ["CUR"] when position cannot be determined. Do not fabricate values.

name: Smart Travel Application Control
description: Open or close the 'Smart Travel' application (APP).

name: A/C Internal/External Circulation Control
description: Open or close the internal/external circulation modes of the A/C system, including internal circulation, external circulation, and automatic circulation modes.
usage: Open internal circulation mode when outdoor air quality is poor.  Open external circulation mode when needing to introduce fresh air/allow outside air to enter. Example: 'The air is nice today, turn off that function to let outside air in' indicates closing internal circulation mode.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off, switch]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off/switch.

mode.description: A/C circulation mode. External circulation indicates 'external airflow mode'.

position.description: Vehicle positions affected, output must be a list. When seat positions cannot be determined, do NOT fabricate values  output default value ["CUR"].

name: Air Conditioning Gear Adjustment
description: Adjust the gear position (intensity) of the air conditioning. 1. Supports increasing or decreasing AC gear levels (in increments). 2. Supports adjusting AC to specific gear positions (whole numbers, percentages) or preset positions (high, medium, low). 3. Supports adjusting AC to maximum/minimum gear positions.
usage: Use this function when hearing: AC increase|AC decrease|AC turn up|AC turn down|AC set to x gear. Examples: 1) AC rising/falling indicates temperature adjustment. 2) Adjusting gear size to x indicates modifying AC airflow intensity.

part.description: Attributes of AC gear position. Typically: gear position/size indicates airflow intensity, gear height indicates temperature level.
mapping_rules: AC move to x gear wind

value.description: Adjustment value for AC gear. Three formats:  Absolute values: unsigned integers (natural numbers) or percentages  Relative adjustments: '+' for increase, '' for decrease  Preset positions: [max, high, mid, low, min]. Default 'N/A' when undetermined.

position.description: Vehicle positions affected. Must output as list. Default ["CUR"] when undetermined.

name: Remote Parking Switch Control
description: Enable or disable the remote parking function.

name: Air Conditioner Negative Ion Switch Control
description: Turn on or off the air conditioner's negative ion function.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Headline Bar Application Control
description: Open or close the 'Headline Bar' application (APP).

name: Air Conditioning Air Volume Gear Adjustment
description: Adjust the intensity level (gear position) of air conditioning air volume, air speed, and air strength. 1. Supports increasing or decreasing air conditioning air volume gear level (air strength, air speed). 2. Supports adjusting air conditioning air volume (air strength, air speed) to specific gear positions (positive integers, percentages) or preset gear positions (high, medium, low). 3. Supports adjusting air conditioning air volume (air strength, air speed) to maximum or minimum gear levels.
usage: Moderate air volume/adjust air strength to medium level indicates setting to medium gear.  Select low air speed gear in quiet environments.  Reduce air volume when blowing feels too cold.  Stronger wind indicates need to increase air volume.  Air conditioning set to minimum indicates need to set air volume to highest; air conditioning set to minimum/slight breeze indicates need to set air volume to lowest.  Air conditioning blowing too cold indicates need to set air volume to lowest gear.
extra_rag_text: Supports adjusting air conditioning air volume/speed/strength for driver seat, passenger seat, first row, second row, and third row. Adjusting air volume to xx% indicates using this function to regulate air conditioning air volume.

part_raw.description: Adjustment attributes matched according to user expressions. air_strength=air_volume.

value.description: Adjustment value for air conditioning air volume (air strength, air speed). Three representation formats:  Set to specific gear position (integer/percentage): Unsigned n (natural number) or unsigned n%, i.e., adjust to nth gear or n%.  Increase/decrease gear level: '+' for increase, '' for decrease. '+n'/'+n%' means increase by n gears/n%, 'n'/'n%' means decrease by n gears/n%, n is positive integer.  Preset gear positions: [max, high, mid, low, min] corresponding to maximum, high, medium, low, minimum gears. Output default 'N/A' when adjustment value cannot be determined.
mapping_rules: Set air conditioning to two gears  2
Set air strength to high  high
Set air strength to medium  mid
Set air strength to low  low
Set air strength to maximum  max
Set air strength to minimum  min
Increase air volume by x gears  +x
Increase air volume by three gears  +3

position.description: Target vehicle positions (must output as list). Output default ["CUR"] when positions cannot be determined.
mapping_rules: turn on vehicle air conditioning  all

name: User/Account Center Page
description: Open or close the User Center/Account Center page. When users need to access user information of the current vehicle or perform account management, this feature allows quick access to the User Center (Account Center) page for viewing or modifying personal information. Related scenarios:  Personal Center page (i.e., User Center page)  Account Login page (i.e., Account Center page).

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Child Lock Switch Control
description: Open or close the child lock. The child lock prevents children from opening doors randomly to ensure their safety.

action.description: Switch status including on and off. Turning on the child lock switch indicates locking it, turning off indicates unlocking.

position.description: Vehicle positions affected by the action, must be output as an array. Defaults to ["CUR"] when seat position cannot be determined.

name: Air Conditioning Temperature Query
description: Query the temperature of the air conditioning system.
usage: For example, 'Report the AC temperature' indicates using this function to query air conditioning temperature.

position.description: Vehicle position(s) involved. Output must be a list. When seat position cannot be determined, DO NOT fabricate values  must output default value ["CUR"].

name: Light Show Control
description: Turn on or off the light show.

name: Door Lock Switch Control
description: Lock or unlock the door locks. Locking door locks prevents accidental door openings to ensure passenger safety and reduces vehicle theft risk. When users cannot open doors or need to exit the vehicle, unlock the door locks. Related scenarios:  Opening doors indicates unlocking door locks.  Closing doors indicates locking door locks.  Locking a specific door position indicates securing that door lock. Unlocking a specific door position indicates releasing that door lock. Example: Locking the driver's door position indicates securing the driver door lock.

action.description: Switch status including lock and unlock. Locking door lock switch indicates securing the door lock, unlocking indicates releasing the door lock.

name: Automatic Defrost and Fog Control
description: Enable or disable the automatic defrost and fog removal feature.
usage: Automatic defrost/fog removal will activate based on frost and fog levels. Note: This functionality should only be used when the user explicitly mentions automatic defrost or automatic fog removal.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off]. Output default value 'N/A' when action cannot be determined as on/off.

name: Air Conditioning Switch Control
description: This function includes subfeatures: 1. Turn compressor on/off. 2. Switch air conditioning modes on/off. 3. Control air conditioning ventilation, fan strength and wind speed functions.
usage: Use this function when needing to turn AC on/off.  Cooling mode generates cold air. Open AC cooling mode when user feels hot.  Max cooling mode produces strongest cold airflow for rapid temperature drop. Activate when user says "I'm hot" or needs cooling.  Heating mode provides warm air. Activate strong heating mode when user feels cold or needs warmth.  Auto mode automatically adjusts AC based on environment.  ECO mode enables energysaving operation. Activate when battery is low.  AI mode indicates intelligent selfadjusting AC.  Natural wind mode examples: "Turn off natural wind mode" means disabling this feature.
extra_rag_text: Supports AC control for driver seat, front passenger seat, and all rows. Cold air indicates cooling mode, warm air indicates heating mode. "Don't use AC" means turning it off. Quick cooling function refers to max cooling mode. Temperature raising function indicates heating mode. Auto temperature adjustment means auto mode. Closing xx heating means disabling heating for specific positions. Use this function for AC shutdown commands.

feature.description: AC airflow features including [ventilation, fan strength, NULL]. Only use when explicitly controlling AC ventilation/fan. Default: 'NULL'.

action.description: Switch status including [on, off].

mode.description: AC operation modes. ECO indicates energysaving mode. Default: 'NULL'. Note: Adaptive mode ≠ Auto mode.

position.description: Vehicle positions affected. Default: ["CUR"] when position unspecified.
